channel.title: Help Please
channel.description:
Hello, Im getting this error when I compile my server. First thing, here is a post of the compiler im using:
[code] @echo off color 0 title _____ javac *.java pause [/code] This is the error I get when compiling:
[code] javac: file not found: *.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options press any key to continue. . . [/code]
Any help is greatly appreciated, I have never had this problem before.

item.title: Help Please
item.dc:creator: @Marc323909 Marc323909
item.description:
@Marc323909 wrote:

[quote=“Paintball199, post:7, topic:188404”][quote author=Paintball199 link=topic=251151.msg2103488#msg2103488 date=1205284383]

Alright have you got something like this at the top of your client.java?

import java.io.;
import java.util.StringTokenizer;
import java.text.;
import java.util.Calendar;
import java.util.GregorianCalendar;
import java.security.*;

That are imports idiot. to make shit load from java.com
and that error or w/e you call it, The Compiler cant find any java file in your folder
so add a java file into your folder voila fixed rofl
[/quote][/quote]

Sozard pall after all you spend your time masturbating over pixels and runescape so I suppose you no u stuff

Read full topic

item.title: Help Please
item.dc:creator: @God_Of_Legend God Of Legend
item.description:
@God_Of_Legend wrote:

Hello, Im getting this error when I compile my server. First thing, here is a post of the compiler im using:

@echo off
color 0
title _____
javac *.java
pause

This is the error I get when compiling:

javac: file not found: *.java
Usage: javac <options> <source files>
use -help for a list of possible options
press any key to continue. . .

Any help is greatly appreciated, I have never had this problem before.

Read full topic
